tachyon.network.protocol.databuffer

Class DataByteBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • tachyon.network.protocol.databuffer.DataByteBuffer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataBuffer

    public final class DataByteBuffer
extends Object
implements DataBuffer
    A DataBuffer with the underlying data being a ByteBuffer.
